title: About ActionMaker
description:
Organizing a team building event involves many aspects. You need to find suitable equipment, specialized animators, and what if you need to find a different activity at the last minute due to changed circumstances?

We know how stressful that can be. Action Maker has 15 years of experience in organizing team building events for companies and strengthening team spirit.

Contact Action Maker today, you'll receive a quote within two days, and we'll take care of everything so your team can have a worry-free day and emerge strengthened from this experience.

founder.title: Founder
founder.subtitle: CEO, Former Belgian Saber Champion
founder.description:
My father had his own event agency. After my training as a top sports shooter, I started organizing shooting initiatives.

It frustrates me that many team building companies listen too little to customer needs and always organize the same activities, often in an amateurish way.

That's why I started building an extensive program of unique activities 15 years ago. Personal contact with the customer was paramount.

It is my conviction that companies should have a pleasant day without worries, so their employees emerge as a strengthened team from the experience.
